name: Five Nights at Freddy's MS Paint Edition
name_original: Five Nights at Freddy's MS Paint Edition
description: This is the 3rd MSPE game I've ever made that's actually getting somewhere. This was originally being made in Clickteam Free Edition. But now I think it should just be an FNAF Engine test. This started out as an FNAF 1 Remake, but since I want it to be published, I cannot let it have FNAF 1's assets, or else I would get in legal trouble. So I morphed FNAF 1 Remade into FNAFMSPE. This is just a quick project made with FNAF Engine just to show what's possible with the engine.
